//solo Words: %1$s HINT
//tuto Next Previous Welcome to NotSbribbl.io! NotSkribbl.io is a cross-plateform game where you can test your drawing skills!

Click on Next to learn how to play! Main Menu From the main menu, click on Play to create or to join a game. 

Click on Profil to see your statistics. 

Click on Options to set your preferences. Chat You always have access to the chat.

In chat, access your active chatrooms.

In Join, view a list of all the chatrooms you can join.

You can also create your own chatroom in Create! Play To play, select the game mode, the difficulty and the language that you desire.

Click on Join or Create to be taken inside a lobby.

 When there is enough players, the creator will be able to start the game! When a game begins, a new private chatroom will be added to your active chatrooms. This is where you will guess the drawing.

If it is your turn to draw, the tools will be below the drawing canvas and the word to draw will be on the top. Game Modes Let's explore together the game modes in which you can play! Classic Mode Form a team and challenge another in 2 vs 2 matches!

When a player draws, his partner needs to guess the word before the time expires or his tries hit 0!

If the word isn't found, the other team can have a reply right! Blind Mode Like the Classic Mode, or almost..!

The drawing player can't see his drawing! Solo Mode Want to play alone? The Solo Mode is perfect.

Guess every word a virtual player is drawing before the time expires or your tries hit 0!

If you guess a word, time will be added to your chrono.

Guess as much words as you can! Coop Mode Like the Solo Mode, but you won't be alone!

Join a team and guess as much words as you together! Free Mode Need calm and serenity? Need to let your artistic self express himself? Thankfully, there's the Free Mode!

Draw the word displayed with no time constraint and no.. stress. Pssst! When a virtual player is drawing, you can ask for a hint by clicking on the dedicated button! It's over! You seem ready, go challenge your friends!
